title: Drawing, "Design for Three Goblets and Tumbler", 1930
medium: Graphite, pen and brown ink on heavy cream paper
markings:
Stamped in purple, upper edge, left:  d/p KRASNA JIZBA DRUZSTEVNI PRACE/P PRAKAL, UL. U PRASNE BRANY TEL. 83124.[Cooperative Work, BEAUTIFUL CHAMBER PRAGUE STUDIO OF MODERN DESIGN AND LIVING ? PRAGUE STREET NO. 3 TEL. 83124
Stamp (partly cut off), lower left verso, embossed circle with hammer in middle, reads around lower half:  SCHULERSHAMMER
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil, upper left:  "S"; in graphite, various mathematical notations throughout; in pen and brwon ink at lower right:  TO BE COMPLETED
description: Scale drawing of three stemmed goblets of assorted sizes across center of sheet and one glass tumbler at lower left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Three Goblets and Tumbler", 1930.
1930. Graphite, pen and brown ink on heavy cream paper. Gift of Gary G. Gura. 1996-113-3.
